title: Forcepoint Security Service Edge - Health Logs
description: This dashboard provides a comprehensive view of overall system health, enabling the analysis of user behavior, application interactions, file activities, and more. It helps customers pinpoint issues with their setup or within their cloud applications.

definition.content:
**Dashboard Overview**

This dashboard provides a comprehensive view of overall system health, enabling the analysis of user behavior, application interactions, file activities, and more. It helps customers pinpoint issues with their setup or within their cloud applications.

For more information, see the [Forcepoint Security Service Edge Integration Documentation](https://docs.datadoghq.com/integrations/forcepoint_security_service_edge/).

**Tips**
- Use the timeframe selector in the top right of the dashboard to change the default timeframe.
- Clone this dashboard to rearrange, modify and add widgets and visualizations.
